items.sentence: When I was thirteen years old, my dad bought me my own fishing boat.
It's actually true that the less money you have, the less you worry.
We stayed outside because we wanted to, not because we were told to.
Tom was lucky to have had a French teacher who was a native speaker.
On this small island are two large towns and many small settlements.
If you didn't complain so much, people would probably like you more.
Tom doesn't want to be a doctor, although he's very good in science.
My horizons are broader than your pupils after cannabis consumption!
Even though Tom is only thirteen years old, he sounds like an adult.
Tom heard the sound of kids talking and laughing outside his window.
